REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0772 reute d f BC-U.S.-MINERALS-<USMX> 03-12 0061

TEXT.TITLE: U.S. MINERALS <USMX> AMENDS REGISTRATION
TEXT.BODY: U.S. Minerals Exploration Co said it filed an amendment to its registration statement for a proposed public offering of a minimum of 500,000 shares and a maximum of 1.3 mln shares of common stock. The amendment reflects an increase in the maximum number of shares to be offered from 800,000 to 1.3 mln. Reuter
